jobs.title: AI Engineer
jobs.description:
### Autonomous security systems for a safer and happier world.

**About the Company**

Established in 2014, we are an artificial intelligence company developing an autonomous video security platform for communities, organizations and enterprises alike. Our mission is to create a powerful automated security visual recognition system to help protect businesses, their assets, and the general public. With offices in San Francisco, London, and Taipei, our software and hardware products currently service major multinational corporations, hotels, schools, and offices across the world.  **Products**  

- Umbo Light - a powerful cloud-based human detection AI SaaS service miles ahead of the competition.
- Umbo AiCameras - the industry’s first security camera with onboard AI processing.
- Umbo TruePlatform - an entirely cloud-based video management platform with open integrations and alert response capabilities.

**Press**

Venture Beat - [Umbo Computer Vision raises $8 million for AI-powered video security](https://venturebeat.com/2019/10/08/umbo-computer-vision-raises-8-million-for-ai-powered-video-security/)

Analytics Insight - [Top 5 Innovative Computer Vision Software Providers in 2019](https://www.analyticsinsight.net/top-5-innovative-computer-vision-software-providers-in-2019/)

CB Insights - [The Deep Learning Market Map: 60+ Startups Working Across E-Commerce, Cybersecurity, Sales](https://www.cbinsights.com/research/deep-learning-ai-startups-market-map-company-list/)

 

**About the Role**

This position is for candidates with a career plan towards being an AI Full Stack engineer. You will study technical reports from our researchers, implement algorithms, build computer vision services, and develop core machine learning pipelines.

As a member of the AI Team, you will work with fellow AI engineers, as well as other creative engineers. The AI Team's goal is to continuously optimize our 3-year-old AI/ML product, Umbo Light, for performance, accuracy, and sustainability, as well as adopt cutting-edge technologies to improve and expand its services! We rigorously strive to make our systems as robust and performable as possible. Our systems have already processed many billions of frames to date, and we’re eager to have you join us in scaling that to new heights.

This role is expected to onboard July-August 2020.

**What You'll Do**

- Learn cutting-edge computer vision and machine learning algorithms.
  - We're super excited whenever new deep learning techniques are out, and serious about applying the best to improve one of our core technologies – autonomous video security. You will join in on our regular discussions covering new research papers and tech, open to all in the company. And of course, we happily encourage you to share your discoveries as well!
- Design, implement and optimize our CV/ML systems such as data collection, model training, evaluation, and serving.
  - You will learn and apply many backend technologies, working with our other talented engineers to come up with creative ways to improve our data processing pipelines.
- Operate large-scale CV systems with our infrastructure engineers.
  - You will design and implement effective performance metrics monitoring rules and alerts to gain insight into how our systems and models are doing. You will learn many modern techniques for building and maintaining distributed ML systems in public clouds, and apply them towards our many challenges in operating production systems that process ever growing amounts of video streams!

**What We're Looking For**

- Proficiency in programming Python, Go, C or C++
- Experience with implementing computer vision or machine learning algorithms in practice at scale
- Ability to write clean and maintainable code with design documents and unit tests
- Good communication skills and a positive attitude to work with colleagues in Taipei, London, and San Francisco
- Advanced writing, listening and speaking skills in English

**Nice To Haves**

- Experience with designing data-intensive applications
- Experience in container technologies like Docker and Kubernetes
- Prior security industry experience
- Contributions to open-source projects
- Records of active contribution to technical communities, such as contributed or invited talks in relevant conferences
- Practical Agile enthusiast 

**Why You'll Enjoy Working At Umbo Computer Vision**

- Competitive salary 
- A bright and comfortable office located 8 min walk from MRT Gangqian Station in Neihu
- Company provided MacBook
- National health insurance and labor insurance 
- Flexible remote working policy - *we trust you to work where you choose so that you can do your best work*
- Flexible vacation - *we don't cap your time off! *
- Annual professional development stipend 
- Annual employee wellness stipend - *because we want all our employees to be happy AND healthy*
- Bi-annual company offsites to connect with coworkers outside the office
- Events including quarterly company dinners, cross-team building events, year-end party, holiday party & gift exchange, and more!
- Fully stocked office with snacks and drinks 
- The chance to work collaboratively in an open, flexible, and fun startup environment
- Opportunity to work with highly talented team members in an international atmosphere

 

**Please submit your application in English.**

 

*Umbo Computer Vision is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, or Veteran status. *

- You’ll have lots of opportunities to grow and advance in our merit-based culture.

**About the Company** Established in 2014, we are an artificial intelligence company developing an autonomous video security platform for communities, organizations and enterprises alike. Our mission is to create a powerful automated security visual recognition system to help protect businesses, their assets, and the general public. With offices in San Francisco, London, and Taipei, our software and hardware products currently service major multinational corporations, hotels, schools, and offices across the world.ver the world.  **Products**

- Umbo TruePlatform - an entirely cloud-based video management platform with open integrations and alert response capabilities.

Analytics Insight - [Top 5 Innovative Computer Vision Software Providers in 2019](https://www.analyticsinsight.net/top-5-innovative-computer-vision-software-providers-in-2019/)

CB Insights - [The Deep Learning Market Map: 60+ Startups Working Across E-Commerce, Cybersecurity, Sales](https://www.cbinsights.com/research/deep-learning-ai-startups-market-map-company-list/)

 

**About the Role**  

We are looking for two Backend Engineers for two of our engineering teams.

Light Cloud (Artificial Intelligence) Team:

As a backend engineer on the Light Cloud (AI) Team, you will own core backend services that support our computer vision applications, including the design and implementation of our machine learning pipelines. Be ready for novel challenges—issues and concerns you encounter may differ from your previous work experience given the nature of large-scale machine learning and streaming video, e.g. GPU-bound issues and real-time systems that have already processed many billions of frames.

 

Automated Machine Learning (AML) Team: 

This position is looking for a Backend Engineer with experience in building distributed systems for ML purposes. You will work closely with our teams across research and engineering disciplines to help us to realize our goal of building a fully automated machine learning pipeline for our security cameras.  

You will help to test and implement some of the latest technologies as well as designing novel architectures to help us to achieve our goal. We are looking for someone who is enthusiastic about this kind of system, who are willing to challenge their ideas and skills in both engineering and research.

We process huge amounts of data, which you will have to analyze using the latest statistical techniques and tools so that we can appropriately scale our systems, at cost. Our systems have already processed many billions of frames to date, and we’re eager to have you join us in scaling to new heights. 

This role is expected to onboard July-August 2020.

**What You'll Do**

- Design and build scalable REST APIs for Umbo products.
- Work with the frontend, app engineers and design teams to build innovative, robust, and easy-to-use features for our users.
- Performance optimization, database management, and system horizontal scaling.
- Participate in code reviews to maintain a high-quality code culture. 
- Design, implement and optimize our Machine Learning pipeline. Including data collection, model training, evaluation, and serving. You will learn and apply many backend technologies, working with our other talented engineers to come up with creative ways to build and improve our data processing pipelines.
- Operate large-scale systems with our infrastructure engineers. You will design and implement effective performance metrics monitoring rules and alerts to gain insight into how our systems and models are doing. You will learn many modern techniques for building and maintaining distributed ML systems in public clouds, and apply them towards our many challenges in operating production systems that process ever growing amounts of video streams!

**What We're Looking For**

- Experience in building RESTful services with either Go, Python or Node.js
- Experience in public clouds like AWS or GCP
- Knowledge of RDBMS or NoSQL databases
- Write clean and maintainable code with design documents and unit tests
- Advanced writing, listening and speaking skills in English

**Nice To Haves**

- Experience in messaging system such as Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS, etc
- Experience in container orchestration such as Kubernetes, ECS
- Experience in designing microservice architecture
- Contributions to open-source projects
- Active participant in technical communities 

**Why You'll Enjoy Working At Umbo Computer Vision**

- Competitive salary 
- A bright and comfortable office located 8 min walk from MRT Gangqian Station in Neihu
- Company provided MacBook
- National health insurance and labor insurance 
- Flexible remote working policy - *we trust you to work where you choose so that you can do your best work*
- Flexible vacation - *we don't cap your time off! *
- Annual professional development stipend 
- Annual employee wellness stipend - *because we want all our employees to be happy AND healthy*
- Bi-annual company offsites to connect with coworkers outside the office
- Events including quarterly company dinners, cross-team building events, year-end party, holiday party & gift exchange, and more!
- Fully stocked office with snacks and drinks 
- The chance to work collaboratively in an open, flexible, and fun startup environment
- Opportunity to work with highly talented team members in an international atmosphere

 

**Please submit your application in English.**

 

*Umbo Computer Vision is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, or Veteran status. *

**The Role**

*Development Team

As a backend engineer on the Dev Team, you are responsible for building our REST APIs, manage server infrastructure and scale service effectively. This includes all associated areas such as database and architecture design. You will expand your experience in building machine learning products and collaborate with frontend engineers, AI engineers and UI/UX designers, on industry-leading applications that process vast amounts of data.

*Artificial Intelligence Team

As a backend engineer on the AI Team, you will own core backend services that support our computer vision applications, including the design and implementation of our machine learning pipelines. Be ready for novel challenges—issues and concerns you encounter may differ from your previous work experience given the nature of large-scale machine learning and streaming video, e.g. GPU-bound issues and real-time systems that have already processed many billions of frames.

**What You'll Do**

- Design and build scalable REST APIs for Umbo products.
- Work with the frontend, app engineers and design teams to build innovative, robust, and easy-to-use features for our users.
- Performance optimization, database management, and system horizontal scaling.
- Participate in code reviews to maintain a high-quality code culture.

**What We're Looking For**

- Experience in building RESTful services with either Go, Python or Node.js
- Experience in public clouds like AWS or GCP
- Knowledge of RDBMS or NoSQL databases
- Write clean and maintainable code with design documents and unit tests

**Nice To Haves**

- Experience in messaging system such as Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS, etc
- Experience in container orchestration such as Kubernetes, ECS
- Experience in designing microservice architecture
- Contributions to open-source projects
- Active participant in technical communities

**Why You'll Enjoy Working At Umbo Computer Vision**

- National Health Insurance and labor insurance
- Events including quarterly company dinners, cross-team building events, year-end party, holiday party & gift exchange, and more!
- Company provided laptop
- Fully stocked office with snacks and drinks 
- The chance to work collaboratively in an open, flexible, and fun startup environment
- Opportunity to work with highly talented team members in an international atmosphere

 

*Umbo Computer Vision is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, or Veteran status. *

**The Role**

At Umbo Computer Vision, the QA Team is a fast-paced team with a high amount of co-working and knowledge sharing while in a fun friendly environment. You will get to play with cutting edge software and try to break them as you go against top-notch developers. This position will get you a great look into the trials and tribulations that software developers face on a daily basis as well as provide you a glimpse into the overall software engineering development life cycle.

**What You'll Do**

- Writing scripts to perform test and quality checks on the web, mobile app, and embedded Linux hardware
- Writing tools and queries to assist the Field Application engineers in debugging support issues
- Test plan creation, execution, and documentation
- Bugfix verification
- Occasional assistance to FAE and development teams

**What We're Looking For**

- Some knowledge of Frontend (HTML, CSS, JavaScript), or Backend (GoLang, C, C++, Java), or scripting (languages like Python)
- Loves to think like a customer/end user and attention to detail
- Enthusiastic to read, speak, and write English
- Willing to program and work with databases in an Unix environment (at least 50%)
- At least 24 hours a week (flexible schedule)

**Nice To Haves**

- Interested in working in a startup environment
- Love puzzles and challenges
- Interested in breaking things (and hacking)
- Interested in programming languages or anything Computer Science related
- Interested in improving your English skills
- Interested in Linux

**Why You'll Enjoy Working At Umbo Computer Vision**

- National Health Insurance and labor insurance
- Events including quarterly company dinners, cross-team building events, year-end party, holiday party & gift exchange, and more!
- Company provided laptop
- Fully stocked office with snacks and drinks 
- The chance to work collaboratively in an open, flexible, and fun startup environment
- Opportunity to work with highly talented team members in an international atmosphere

 

**Note that this is not a remote position. Please only apply if you can work in our Taipei office.**   **Please submit your application in English.**

 

*Umbo Computer Vision is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, or Veteran status. *

jobs.title: Senior Accountant / Finance Manager
jobs.description:
### Autonomous security systems for a safer and happier world.
**About the Company**  Established in 2014, we are an artificial intelligence company developing an autonomous video security platform for communities, organizations and enterprises alike. Our mission is to create a powerful automated security visual recognition system to help protect businesses, their assets, and the general public. With offices in San Francisco, London, and Taipei, our software and hardware products currently service major multinational corporations, hotels, schools, and offices across the world.  **Products**  

- Umbo Light - a powerful cloud-based human detection AI SaaS service miles ahead of the competition.
- Umbo AiCameras - the industry’s first security camera with onboard AI processing.
- Umbo TruePlatform - an entirely cloud-based video management platform with open integrations and alert response capabilities.

**Press**

Venture Beat - [Umbo Computer Vision raises $8 million for AI-powered video security](https://venturebeat.com/2019/10/08/umbo-computer-vision-raises-8-million-for-ai-powered-video-security/)

Analytics Insight - [Top 5 Innovative Computer Vision Software Providers in 2019](https://www.analyticsinsight.net/top-5-innovative-computer-vision-software-providers-in-2019/)

CB Insights - [The Deep Learning Market Map: 60+ Startups Working Across E-Commerce, Cybersecurity, Sales](https://www.cbinsights.com/research/deep-learning-ai-startups-market-map-company-list/)

 

**About the Role**

- Report to Chief of Staff.
- This could be your first step transitioning from Accounting to Financial Planning and Analysis (FP&A). You will be mentored and guided along the way.
- You will join our team in its early stages and help us grow the team.

**What You'll Do**

- Accounting standards and transactional accounting
  - Maintain charts of accounts
  - Review accuracy and legitimacy of recorded transactions
  - Oversee receivables and payables process, including transactions for tax purposes
  - Oversee reconciliation of sub-ledgers and other accounts, including cash and credit card
  - Oversee monthly closing process
  - Oversee assistance provided to human resources on employee reimbursement
- Statutory and regulatory reporting
  - Prepare financial reports for internal and external stakeholders
  - Assist external auditors on annual audit
  - Oversee tax filing process, including income, consumption and value-added tax
- Cash managements
  - Forecast cash balances and evaluate funding needs
  - Evaluate risks to cash collections and expenditures
  - Analyze and optimize financing of working capital
- Planning, budgeting and forecasting
  - Lead quarterly planning, budgeting and forecasting process and track returns on expenditure
  - Monitor key performance indicators and identify significant trends

**_How You'll Grow_**

- **Join us as we leverage technology to build a world-class finance and accounting system.**
- **You’ll acquire high-demand skills in cloud software and process automation.**
- **You’ll spend less time doing repetitive work and more time discussing strategy and finance with our leadership team.**
- **You’ll learn the ins and outs of an AI technology startup and see how your work impacts our organization and customers.**
- **You’ll have lots of opportunities to grow and advance in our merit-based culture.**

**What We're Looking For**

Required:

- 3+ years of experience in accrual-based accounting, including 1+ year of experience in a SME or large enterprise
- Bachelor’s degree in accounting or related field
- Advanced understanding of key concepts (e.g. revenue and expense recognition, deferral and accrual adjustments), and key accounts (e.g. receivables, inventory, property, plant & equipment, payables, accrued liabilities)
- Advanced reading and writing skills in English
- Experienced user of Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets

Preferred:

- Experienced user of cloud accounting software (e.g. Quickbooks, Xero)
- Prior experience with merchandising business models (e.g. purchasing, inventory, logistics)
- Certified Public Accountant (CPA) license
- Advanced listening and speaking skills in English

**Why You'll Enjoy Working At Umbo Computer Vision**

- Competitive salary (NT$840k to NT$1M annually)
- A bright and comfortable office located 8 min walk from MRT Gangqian Station in Neihu
- Company provided MacBook
- National health insurance and labor insurance 
- Flexible remote working policy - *we trust you to work where you choose so that you can do your best work*
- Flexible vacation - *we don't cap your time off! *
- Annual professional development stipend 
- Annual employee wellness stipend - *because we want all our employees to be happy AND healthy*
- Bi-annual company offsites to connect with coworkers outside the office
- Events including quarterly company dinners, cross-team building events, year-end party, holiday party & gift exchange, and more!
- Fully stocked office with snacks and drinks 
- The chance to work collaboratively in an open, flexible, and fun startup environment
- Opportunity to work with highly talented team members in an international atmosphere

 

**Please submit your application in English.**

 

*Umbo Computer Vision is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, or Veteran status. *
